microsim.gui.space

Class LayerMouseListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • microsim.gui.space.LayerMouseListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILayerMouseListener

    public class LayerMouseListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILayerMouseListener
    A generic implementation of the ILayerMouseListener interface. If you want to manage only one or two mouse events, you can extend this class, overriding only the useful methods. The methods not overridden return always false.

    Title: JAS

    Description: Java Agent-based Simulation library

    • Method Detail

      • performDblClickActionAt

        public boolean performDblClickActionAt(int atX,
                              int atY)
        Description copied from interface: ILayerMouseListener
        Notify a double click event on a specific cell.
        Specified by:
        performDblClickActionAt in interface ILayerMouseListener
        Parameters:
        atX - The x coordinate of the clicked cell.
        atY - The y coordinate of the clicked cell.
        Returns:
        True if the layer intercepted the event. False if the notify has been ignored.

      • performRightClickActionAt

        Description copied from interface: ILayerMouseListener

        Specified by:

      • performMouseMovedFromTo

        public boolean performMouseMovedFromTo(int fromX,
                              int fromY,
                              int toX,
                              int toY)
        Description copied from interface: ILayerMouseListener
        Notify a mouse dragging action.
        Specified by:
        performMouseMovedFromTo in interface ILayerMouseListener
        Parameters:
        fromX - The x coordinate of the starting cell.
        fromY - The y coordinate of the starting cell.
        toX - The x coordinate of the target cell.
        toY - The y coordinate of the target cell.
        Returns:
        True if the layer intercepted the event. False if the notify has been ignored.
